statements: UPDATE music_production_studio_inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE equipment_id = 1;

UPDATE Studio_Equipment SET quantity = quantity + 5, price = price * 1.1 WHERE equipment_id = 101;
UPDATE Studio_Inventory SET location = 'Room A', quantity = 20 WHERE category = 'Cameras';
